General.Name: The Qassim Cement Co
General.Description: Qassim Cement Company engages in the manufacture, producing, and trading of cement in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It offers ordinary Portland, Portland pozzolana, sulphate resistant, and finishing cement products, as well as derivatives and supplements of cement. The company was incorporated in 1976 and is based in Buraydah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
